response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and innovation, worth far more than its face value. I believe it has the potential to enrich your life in ways you might not even imagine.

Considering the unparalleled quality and significance of this product, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the chance to own this masterpiece at an exceptional price of $850,000. This is an opportunity to secure a piece of history at a fraction of its true worth.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I am confident that once you understand the depth and potential of this product, you will see the wisdom in my offer.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
